expert.name: Bryan Johnson

interventions.name: Blueprint Sleep Protocol
interventions.description: Wind down 2 hours before bed, blackout room, cool temperature (65-68F), consistent sleep/wake times

nutrition_principles.guidance: Eat all calories within a 6-hour window, finishing by 11am. This allows for 18-hour daily fast.
Maintain caloric intake around 1,950 calories per day for longevity benefits while supporting muscle mass.
Daily Super Veggie meal: black lentils, broccoli, cauliflower, mushrooms, garlic, ginger, lime, cumin, apple cider vinegar, hemp seeds, olive oil.
Target 25% of calories from protein (~130g/day), primarily from plant sources with some collagen supplementation.
Complete abstinence from alcohol for optimal sleep, liver health, and cognitive function.
Eliminate added sugars and minimize high-glycemic foods to maintain stable blood glucose.
